profile:
As a locally owned and operated heating and cooling company in Burlington, at Canadian Heating & Air Conditioning customer service is our first priority. Whether you need your furnace replaced or air conditioning repaired, our knowledgeable team is able to meet your needs.  We specialize in furnace repair and air conditioner repairs in the Burlington, Oakville, and Hamilton area.  Feel free to call Canadian Heating and Air Conditioning for a free quote when you decide to replace your furnace , A/C or hot water tank.

Canadian Heating and Air Conditioning Inc seeks to maintain our solid reputation among residential clients for reliable service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. For more information about our services or to receive your free estimate, contact us today! www.canadianheatingandair.ca 

Furnace repair, No heat, Burlington Furnace, Oakville Furnace, Hamilton Furnace, Repair all models, Napoleon, Goodman, Lennox, Carrier, and many others.

profile:
☆☆☆LICENSED AND REGISTERED HEATING AND AIR CONDITIONING COMPANY☆☆☆
BOSS Mechanical Inc. is a licensed and registered heating and air conditioning company.  We serve the Brampton, GTA, Mississauga, Halton Region, Markham, Richmond Hill, Stouffville, Hamilton, Oakville, Burlington, Ancaster and all surrounding areas to provide the highest quality in HVAC services and installation.  If you are looking for expert contractors, fast service and quality products call us today!

☆☆☆HIGH QUALITY SERVICES☆☆☆
BOSS Mechanical Inc. is a consumer driven company who pride ourselves on providing high quality HVAC solutions, cleanliness, professional services and affordable rates to help give our customers peace of mind.

☆☆☆QUALIFIED TECHNICIANS☆☆☆
All our technicians are licensed, knowledgeable, skilled installers with experienced workmanship.  We are committed to providing total customer satisfaction, whatever the weather may be.  Your satisfaction is our goal!

profile: Hamilton Home Comfort is a local heating and cooling company that is dedicated to providing top quality service and installation for gas fireplaces, furnaces and central ACs. We are an authorized dealer for the most innovative and reputable fireplace brands on the market such as Napoleon, Regency and Savannah. We are also an authorized dealer for the top HVAC brands such as Lennox, York, Goodman and KeepRite. Our dedication to customer service and our attention to detail is what sets us apart from our competitors. We are truly dedicated to ensuring our customers have a pleasant experience from the second they contact our office to the moment they can enjoy their heating or cooling appliance whether that be enjoying a complimentary bottle of wine by the new fireplace or sipping a cold beverage in the comfort of their newly air conditioned house on a hot summer day. We live by our motto, "Come in as a customer, leave as a friend."
